languages.text: "Вторая печать..." {n}Окуляры на носу старухи перещелкиваются, пока сухие ладони перебирают истлевшие свитки.{/n} "Хранится в системе Теликос Эпсилон по приказу ОЛ-008/ЗН. К сожалению, после пожара двухвековой давности от указа осталось лишь приложение с заверением неизвестного адептуса с инициалами А.А. Никаких указаний по отмене сего приказа со святой Терры получено не было, потому печать и по сей день остается там, где ей и должно быть".

traits.locale_text: "Вторая печать..." {n}Окуляры на носу старухи перещелкиваются, пока сухие ладони перебирают истлевшие свитки.{/n} "Хранится в системе Теликос Эпсилон по приказу ОЛ-008/ЗН. К сожалению, после пожара двухвековой давности от указа осталось лишь приложение с заверением неизвестного адептуса с инициалами А.А. Никаких указаний по отмене сего приказа со святой Терры получено не было, потому печать и по сей день остается там, где ей и должно быть".

languages.text: "The second seal..." {n}The ocular lenses perched on her nose click as she rifles through mouldering scrolls with her wrinkled fingers.{/n} "...is held in the Telikos Epsilon System in accordance with decree OL-008/ZN. Unfortunately, after a fire two hundred years ago, all that remains of the original decree is an addendum certified by an unknown adept with the initials A.A. No instructions repealing this decree were ever received from Holy Terra, therefore the seal remains where it ought to be."
languages.original_text: "Вторая печать..." {n}Окуляры на носу старухи перещелкиваются, пока сухие ладони перебирают истлевшие свитки.{/n} "Хранится в системе Теликос Эпсилон по приказу ОЛ-008/ЗН. К сожалению, после пожара двухвековой давности от указа осталось лишь приложение с заверением неизвестного адептуса с инициалами А.А. Никаких указаний по отмене сего приказа со святой Терры получено не было, потому печать и по сей день остается там, где ей и должно быть".

traits.locale_text: "The second seal..." {n}The ocular lenses perched on her nose click as she rifles through mouldering scrolls with her wrinkled fingers.{/n} "...is held in the Telikos Epsilon System in accordance with decree OL-008/ZN. Unfortunately, after a fire 200 cycles ago, all that remains of the original decree is an addendum certified by an unknown adept with the initials A.A. No instructions repealing this decree were ever received from holy Terra, therefore the seal remains where it ought to be."

"The second seal..." {n}The ocular lenses perched on her nose click as she rifles through mouldering scrolls with her wrinkled fingers.{/n} "...is held in the Telikos Epsilon System in accordance with decree OL-008/ZN. Unfortunately, after a fire 200 cycles ago, all that remains of the original decree is an addendum certified by an unknown adept with the initials A.A. No instructions repealing this decree were ever received from Holy Terra, therefore the seal remains where it ought to be."

languages.text: “至于第二个印章……”{n}她用皱纹密布的手指翻阅着发霉的卷轴，架在鼻梁上的目镜发出了咔嚓声。{/n}“……则是根据OL-008/ZN号法令，被保存在特里克斯·伊普西隆星系。遗憾的是，200个年之前，那里发生了一场大火，原本的法令绝大部分已被烧毁，只剩下附录部分，上面有一位名字不详的神职人员的签名。我们尚未从神圣泰拉得到废除这条法令的指示，因此那个印章依然保留在它原本该在的地方。”
languages.original_text: "The second seal..." {n}The ocular lenses perched on her nose click as she rifles through mouldering scrolls with her wrinkled fingers.{/n} "...is held in the Telikos Epsilon System in accordance with decree OL-008/ZN. Unfortunately, after a fire two hundred years ago, all that remains of the original decree is an addendum certified by an unknown adept with the initials A.A. No instructions repealing this decree were ever received from Holy Terra, therefore the seal remains where it ought to be."

traits.locale_text: “至于第二个印章……”{n}她用皱纹密布的手指翻阅着发霉的卷轴，架在鼻梁上的目镜发出了咔嚓声。{/n}“……则是根据OL-008/ZN号法令，被保存在特里克斯·伊普西隆星系。遗憾的是，200个周期之前，那里发生了一场大火，原本的法令绝大部分已被烧毁，只剩下附录部分，上面有一位名字不详的神职人员的签名。我们尚未从神圣泰拉得到废除这条法令的指示，因此那个印章依然保留在它原本该在的地方。”

languages.text: «En cuanto al segundo sello...». {n}Las lentes oculares que lleva en la nariz chasquean conforme hojea pergaminos mohosos.{/n} «... está en el sistema Telikos Epsilon, conforme lo estipulado por el decreto OL-008/ZN. Lamentablemente, tras el incendio de hace doscientos años, lo único que queda del decreto original es un anexo certificado por un adepto desconocido con iniciales A. A. No hemos recibido instrucciones que alteren el decreto desde la sagrada Terra, por lo que el sello sigue en su legítimo lugar».
languages.original_text: "The second seal..." {n}The ocular lenses perched on her nose click as she rifles through mouldering scrolls with her wrinkled fingers.{/n} "...is held in the Telikos Epsilon System in accordance with decree OL-008/ZN. Unfortunately, after a fire two hundred years ago, all that remains of the original decree is an addendum certified by an unknown adept with the initials A.A. No instructions repealing this decree were ever received from Holy Terra, therefore the seal remains where it ought to be."

traits.locale_text: «En cuanto al segundo sello...». {n}Las lentes oculares que lleva en la nariz chasquean conforme hojea pergaminos mohosos.{/n} «... está en el sistema Telikos Epsilon, conforme lo estipulado por el decreto OL-008/ZN. Lamentablemente, tras el incendio de hace 200 ciclos, lo único que queda del decreto original es un anexo certificado por un adepto desconocido con iniciales A. A. No hemos recibido instrucciones que alteren el decreto desde la sagrada Terra, por lo que el sello sigue en su legítimo lugar».

languages.text: 「ふたつめの封ろうは…」{n}鼻の上に収まっている印章長の眼鏡が、しわだらけの指と一緒にぼろぼろの巻物をくまなく調べている。{/n}「…OL-008/ZN令により、ティリコス・イプシロン星系での保管が決まっています。残念ながら、200年前の火事の後、他のオリジナルの封ろうはイニシャルA.A.という名も無き職員が承認した補遺となっています。この判決を無効にする指示はこれまで聖なる地球より発せられていませんので、封ろうの場所は当時のままとなっています」
languages.original_text: "The second seal..." {n}The ocular lenses perched on her nose click as she rifles through mouldering scrolls with her wrinkled fingers.{/n} "...is held in the Telikos Epsilon System in accordance with decree OL-008/ZN. Unfortunately, after a fire two hundred years ago, all that remains of the original decree is an addendum certified by an unknown adept with the initials A.A. No instructions repealing this decree were ever received from Holy Terra, therefore the seal remains where it ought to be."

traits.locale_text: 「ふたつめの封ろうは…」{n}鼻の上に収まっている印章長の眼鏡が、しわだらけの指と一緒にぼろぼろの巻物をくまなく調べている。{/n}「…OL-008/ZN令により、ティリコス・イプシロン星系での保管が決まっています。残念ながら、200年前の火事の後、他のオリジナルの封ろうはイニシャルA.A.という名も無き職員が承認した補遺となっています。この判決を無効にする指示はこれまで聖なる地球より発せられていませんので、封ろうの場所は当時のままとなっています」

languages.text: « Quant au second sceau... » {n}Les lorgnons perchés sur son nez cliquettent alors qu'elle fouille de ses doigts ridés une pile de vieux parchemins moisis.{/n} « ... il est conservé dans le système Telikos Epsilon, conformément au décret OL-008/ZN. Malheureusement, suite à un incendie survenu il y a deux cents ans de cela, tout ce qu'il reste de l'arrêté originel est un addendum validé par un agent inconnu portant les initiales AA. Aucune instruction contraire n'ayant été reçue de la Sainte Terra depuis lors, le sceau demeure à ce jour à sa place légitime. »
languages.original_text: "The second seal..." {n}The ocular lenses perched on her nose click as she rifles through mouldering scrolls with her wrinkled fingers.{/n} "...is held in the Telikos Epsilon System in accordance with decree OL-008/ZN. Unfortunately, after a fire two hundred years ago, all that remains of the original decree is an addendum certified by an unknown adept with the initials A.A. No instructions repealing this decree were ever received from Holy Terra, therefore the seal remains where it ought to be."

traits.locale_text: « Quant au second sceau... » {n}Les lorgnons perchés sur son nez cliquettent alors qu'elle fouille de ses doigts ridés une pile de vieux parchemins moisis.{/n} « ... il est conservé dans le système Telikos Epsilon, conformément au décret OL-008/ZN. Malheureusement, suite à un incendie survenu il y a 200 cycles de cela, tout ce qu'il reste de l'arrêté originel est un addendum validé par un agent inconnu portant les initiales AA. Aucune instruction contraire n'ayant été reçue de la Sainte Terra depuis lors, le sceau demeure à ce jour à sa place légitime. »

languages.text: "Das zweite Siegel ..." {n}Die Linsen auf ihrer Nase klicken, als sie mit ihren faltigen Fingern modrige Schriftrollen durchblättert.{/n} "... befindet sich im System Telikos Epsilon, gemäß Erlass OL-008/ZN. Leider ist nach einem Brand vor zweihundert Jahren von dem Erlass nur noch ein Zusatz erhalten, bestätigt von einem Adepten mit den Initialen A.A. Wir haben vom Heiligen Terra nie Anweisungen zur Aufhebung des Erlasses erhalten, weshalb das Siegel immer noch ist, wo es hingehört."
languages.original_text: "The second seal..." {n}The ocular lenses perched on her nose click as she rifles through mouldering scrolls with her wrinkled fingers.{/n} "...is held in the Telikos Epsilon System in accordance with decree OL-008/ZN. Unfortunately, after a fire two hundred years ago, all that remains of the original decree is an addendum certified by an unknown adept with the initials A.A. No instructions repealing this decree were ever received from Holy Terra, therefore the seal remains where it ought to be."

traits.locale_text: "Das zweite Siegel ..." {n}Die Linsen auf ihrer Nase klicken, als sie mit ihren faltigen Fingern modrige Schriftrollen durchblättert.{/n} "... befindet sich im System Telikos Epsilon, gemäß Erlass OL-008/ZN. Leider ist nach einem Brand vor 200 Zyklen von dem Erlass nur noch ein Zusatz erhalten, bestätigt von einem Adepten mit den Initialen A.A. Wir haben vom heiligen Terra nie Anweisungen zur Aufhebung des Erlasses erhalten, weshalb das Siegel immer noch ist, wo es hingehört."

languages.text: "İkinci mühür ise..." {n}Kadın, kırışık parmaklarıyla çürüyen tomarları karıştırırken burnuna oturttuğu oküler merceklerinden tıkırtılar çıkıyor.{/n} "OL-008/ZN Sayılı kararname uyarınca Telikos Epsilon Sistemi'nde tutulmaktadır. Ne yazık ki iki yüz yıl önce çıkan bir yangın yüzünden o kararnamenin aslından geriye sadece adının baş harfleri A.A. olan kimliği meçhul bir üstadın tasdik ettiği bir zeyil kalmış. Kutsal Terra'dan bu kararnameyi fesheden bir talimat asla gelmediği için mühür, olması gerektiği yerde duruyor."
languages.original_text: "The second seal..." {n}The ocular lenses perched on her nose click as she rifles through mouldering scrolls with her wrinkled fingers.{/n} "...is held in the Telikos Epsilon System in accordance with decree OL-008/ZN. Unfortunately, after a fire two hundred years ago, all that remains of the original decree is an addendum certified by an unknown adept with the initials A.A. No instructions repealing this decree were ever received from Holy Terra, therefore the seal remains where it ought to be."

Ne yazık ki iki yüz yıl önce çıkan bir yangın yüzünden o kararnamenin aslından geriye sadece adının baş harfleri A.A. olan kimliği meçhul bir üstadın tasdik ettiği bir zeyil kalmış. Kutsal Terra'dan bu kararnameyi fesheden bir talimat asla gelmediği için mühür, olması gerektiği yerde duruyor."
